metadata.synopsis: Dr. Rochelle (Mason Adams) assigns nurse Amanda Sayles (Elizabeth Barondes) to an in-home position at the residence of Paul Johnson (Michael York), a wealthy man with a bizarre blood condition who needs daily transfusions. After a string of disappearances of houseguests, Sayles begins to suspect her employer is an alien with a taste for human blood. With the help of Johnson's eccentric butler, Jeremy (Richard Belzer), Sayles struggles to stop the alien's plans to conquer the Earth.
